parameters.name: BgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the subtitles. Color format: RGBA.

parameters.name: BgWidthNormalized
parameters.description: The size of the background box. Valid values: \[0,1].

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the subtitle template. The description can be up to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and special characters.

parameters.name: DstLanguage
parameters.description:
The target language. Valid values:

*   en-US: English
*   zh-CN: Chinese
*   es-ES: Spanish
*   ru-RU: Russian

parameters.name: FontColor
parameters.description: The font color. Color format: RGBA.

parameters.name: FontName
parameters.description:
The font. Valid values:

*   KaiTi (default)
*   AlibabaPuHuiTi-Regular
*   AlibabaPuHuiTi-Bold
*   AlibabaPuHuiTi-Light
*   NotoSansHans-Regular
*   NotoSansHans-Bold
*   NotoSansHans-Light

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description:
The height of the preview. Unit: pixels.

The following preview specifications (width x height) are supported:

*   360p (640 x 360)
*   360p (360 x 640)
*   480p (854 x 480)
*   480p (480 x 854)
*   720p (1280 x 720)
*   720p (720 x 1280)
*   1080p (1920 x 1080)
*   1080p (1080 x 1920)

parameters.name: PositionNormalized
parameters.description: The position of the subtitles relative to the lower-left corner of the screen. The value is a pair of coordinates.

parameters.name: ShowSourceLan
parameters.description: Specifies whether to display the source language. Valid values: true and false. Default value: false.

parameters.name: SrcLanguage
parameters.description:
The source language. Valid values:

*   en-US: English
*   zh-CN: Chinese
*   ru-RU: Russian

parameters.name: SubtitleId
parameters.description: The ID of the subtitle template.

parameters.name: SubtitleName
parameters.description: The name of the subtitle template. The name can contain digits, letters, and hyphens (-) but cannot start with a hyphen (-).

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The width of the preview. Unit: pixels.

parameters.name: WordPerLine
parameters.description: The number of characters per line. Valid values: 1 to 500.
